keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject

headline.print_headline: Rights ‘Dire’ in Iran, U.N. Official Says
headline.main: U.N. Rights Investigator Highly Critical of Iran

byline.contributor: Thomas Erdbrink contributed reporting from Tehran.

snippet: A special investigator documented a record rate of executions, a deeply flawed judiciary system and repression of journalists, dissidents and women.
abstract: United Nations official Ahmed Shaheed says human rights conditions in Iran 'remains dire;' points out record rate of executions and repression of news media, dissidents, women and freedom of expression; report contradicts Pres Hassan Rouhani's moderate image.
lead_paragraph: A special investigator documented a record rate of executions, a deeply flawed judiciary system and repression of journalists, dissidents and women.
